aima.core.environment.wumpusworld

Class WumpusKnowledgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.logic.propositional.kb.KnowledgeBase
      • aima.core.environment.wumpusworld.WumpusKnowledgeBase

  • public class WumpusKnowledgeBase
extends KnowledgeBase
    A Knowledge base tailored to the Wumpus World environment.
    Author:
    Federico Baron, Alessandro Daniele, Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WumpusKnowledgeBase(int caveXandYDimensions)
      Create a Knowledge Base that contains the atemporal "wumpus physics" and temporal rules with time zero.
